name: Super G-Man
overview: Running into rock-faces will pierce your suit, leading to quick suffocation in the emptiness of space. An even messier demise awaits those who touch the land-mines that are a remnant of the great lunar war. FUEL dumps and AMMO are occasionally found on the lunar surface - TELEPORT CHAMBERS can be a risky short cut. There are many evil aliens - most can be blasted with your laser but some, including the huge Blowerfish and the grotesque green hollow worm will be much more formidable opponents.
